Package hippodrome

Provides the classes necessary to create an environment needed to complete a horse race scenario.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BettingCentreInterface
    Interface of the place where the Spectators place their bets on the winning horse.
    ControlCentreInterface
    Interface of the place where the Spectators go to enjoy the race (at a Watching Stand) and the Broker controls the races and publishes its results.
    GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface
    Interface of the class which represents an archive of all hippodrome's actions and memorabilia.
    PaddockInterface
    Interface of the place where the horses are paradded before the Spectators.
    RacingTrackInterface
    Interface of the place where the races take place.
    StableInterface
    Interface of the place where the horses rest waiting their turn to enter the competition.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BettingCentre
    Place where the Spectators place their bets on the winning horse.
    ControlCentre
    Place where the Spectators go to enjoy the race (at a Watching Stand) and the Broker controls the races and publishes its results.
    GeneralInformationRepository
    Class which represents an archive of all hippodrome's actions and memorabilia.
    Paddock
    Place where the horses are paradded before the Spectators.
    RacingTrack
    Place where the races take place.
    Stable
    Place where the horses rest waiting their turn to enter the competition.

Package hippodrome Description

Provides the classes necessary to create an environment needed to complete a horse race scenario. Its contents are a BettingCentre, a ControlCentre, a Paddock, a GeneralInformationRepository, a RacingTrack and a Stable (and its interfaces).
Since:
0.1
See Also:
entities, hippodrome.actions, server
